trans-unit.source: A Ribbon control that combines a button or a toggle button and a drop-down menu.
trans-unit.target: 一个功能区控件，它将按钮或切换按钮与下拉菜单组合在一起。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> control combines a button or a toggle button and a drop-down menu.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>一个按钮或切换按钮和下拉菜单中，控件将合并。

trans-unit.source: To choose between the button and toggle button, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ButtonType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要选择之间的按钮和切换按钮，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ButtonType%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu> control, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> control does not have the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Dynamic%2A> property, so contents of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.Items%2A> collection cannot be changed at run time.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu>控件，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>控件不具有<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Dynamic%2A>属性，因此内容<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.Items%2A>在运行时，不能更改集合。

trans-unit.source: You can create a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> at run time by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory.CreateRibbonSplitButton%2A> method of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory> object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>通过使用在运行时<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory.CreateRibbonSplitButton%2A>方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory>对象。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to access the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory> object:
trans-unit.target: 可通过两种方法来访问 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory> 对象：

trans-unit.source: By using the `Factory` property of the Ribbon class.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 Ribbon 类的 `Factory` 属性。

trans-unit.source: Use this approach from code in your Ribbon class.
trans-unit.target: 可从 Ribbon 类中的代码使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: By using the `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` method.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` 方法。

trans-unit.source: Use this approach from code outside your Ribbon class.
trans-unit.target: 可从 Ribbon 类外的代码使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 用法

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the button on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> 上的按钮。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the button of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已启用 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> 的按钮，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is specific to the button part of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是特定于按钮属于<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>。

trans-unit.source: If only the button is disabled, users can still open the drop-down menu and click the controls there.
trans-unit.target: 如果只将禁用的按钮，用户仍可以打开下拉列表菜单和单击其中的控件。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControl.Enabled%2A> property indicates whether the entire <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> control is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControl.Enabled%2A>属性指示是否整个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>启用控制。

trans-unit.source: If the control is disabled completely, the entire control does not react to any user actions.
trans-unit.target: 如果完全禁用了控件，则整个控件没有反应任何用户操作。

trans-unit.source: This property can be changed at run time.
trans-unit.target: 可以在运行时更改此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of the button on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> 上的按钮类型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButtonType" /> that represents the type of the button on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButtonType" />，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> 上的按钮类型。

trans-unit.source: The two options are <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButtonType.Button> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButtonType.ToggleButton>.
trans-unit.target: 有两个选项<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButtonType.Button>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButtonType.ToggleButton>。

trans-unit.source: The property cannot be changed at run time.
trans-unit.target: 不能在运行时更改属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> is pressed or not pressed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否按下了 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> is pressed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果按下了 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property applies only if <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ButtonType%2A> is set to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButtonType.ToggleButton>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅适用于<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ButtonType%2A>设置为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButtonType.ToggleButton>。

trans-unit.source: This property can be changed at run time.
trans-unit.target: 可以在运行时更改此属性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> 控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> has the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ButtonType%2A> property set to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButtonType.ToggleButton>, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.Checked%2A> property is updated before this event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>具有<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ButtonType%2A>属性设置为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButtonType.ToggleButton>、<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.Checked%2A>属性将更新之前将引发此事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> 控件的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize</c> that represents the size of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> control.
trans-unit.target: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize</c>表示大小的<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" />控件。

trans-unit.source: This property has no effect if the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> is part of a menu.
trans-unit.target: 此属性如果不起作用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>是菜单的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ControlSize%2A> of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> that appears on a menu is always set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular` unless the parent control's `ItemSize` is set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ControlSize%2A>的<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>上显示一个菜单始终设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular`除非父控件的`ItemSize`设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。

trans-unit.source: To make <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> drop-down menu controls appear larger, set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ItemSize%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>下拉列表菜单控件出现更大，设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ItemSize%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>到`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set at run time.
trans-unit.target: 可以在运行时设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that appears on this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> control in a drop-down menu.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置下拉菜单中此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> 控件上显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text that appears on the control when it is inside of a drop-down menu.
trans-unit.target: 如果文本位于下拉菜单内，则会在控件上显示。

trans-unit.source: The description appears when the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> is nested in another menu or split button, and the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ItemSize%2A> property of the parent menu is set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.
trans-unit.target: 该说明将显示当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>嵌套在另一个菜单或拆分按钮，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ItemSize%2A>父菜单的属性设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ItemSize%2A> is set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular`, the description does not appear.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ItemSize%2A>设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular`，说明未显示。

trans-unit.source: This property can be changed at run time.
trans-unit.target: 可以在运行时更改此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image that is displayed on the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件上显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> that is displayed on the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个在控件上显示的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The recommended image format is PNG, because images in the PNG format support transparency through their alpha channel.
trans-unit.target: 建议的图像格式是 PNG，因为 PNG 格式的图像支持通过其 alpha 通道的透明度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.Image%2A> property identifies an image that is displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.Image%2A>属性标识由控件显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set at design time or at run time.
trans-unit.target: 在设计时或在运行时，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change.
trans-unit.target: 如果在运行时中更新此属性，将更新控件的外观，以反映更改。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.Image%2A> property is set, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.OfficeImageId%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ImageName%2A> properties are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.Image%2A>设置属性，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.OfficeImageId%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ImageName%2A>属性会被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.Image%2A> property gives you more control than the other two properties do, it can be slower because the image object is sent to the Office application every time the control is updated.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.Image%2A>属性提供更好地控制比其他两个属性，因为每次对控件进行更新时，图像对象被发送到 Office 应用程序会比较慢。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name that you can use in the <c>E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.LoadImage</c> event handler to identify an image for the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个名称，该名称可用于在 <c>E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.LoadImage</c> 事件处理程序中标识控件图像。

trans-unit.source: A string that you can use in the <c>E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage</c> event handler to identify an image for the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，你可以在使用<c>E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage</c>事件处理程序来标识该控件的图像。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ImageName%2A> property identifies an image that is displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ImageName%2A>属性标识由控件显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: The Office application retrieves this image from your solution only once, to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: Office 应用程序检索此映像从你的解决方案一次，以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set only at design time, because the image it identifies is loaded during the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage> event.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以设置仅在设计时，因为它标识的图像加载期间<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage>事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage> is raised only once per image name, when the Ribbon is displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage> 时将引发一次每个映像名称将显示功能区。

trans-unit.source: After that, the control image cannot be changed by using this property.
trans-unit.target: 之后，无法使用此属性更改控件图像。

trans-unit.source: To load the image, add code to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要加载的映像，将代码添加到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs.ImageName%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs> and set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs.Image%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs> object to the image that you want to load.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs.ImageName%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs>并设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs.Image%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs>到想要加载的映像的对象。

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored if either the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.Image%2A> property or the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.OfficeImageId%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果忽略此属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.Image%2A>属性或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.OfficeImageId%2A>属性设置。

trans-unit.source: Images identified by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ImageName%2A> property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.Image%2A> property, because the Office application retrieves the image from your solution only the first time the Ribbon is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 标识的图像<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ImageName%2A>属性可以由标识的图像以外会稍微快一些加载<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.Image%2A>显示属性，因为 Office 应用程序将检索映像你解决方案仅在首次从功能区。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of controls that are on this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> 上的控件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of controls on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> 上的控件的集合。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时仅在某些情况下，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the controls on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> drop-down menu.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> 下拉菜单上控件的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize</c> that represents the size of the controls on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> drop-down menu.
trans-unit.target: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize</c>上表示控件的大小<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" />下拉菜单。

trans-unit.source: To enlarge controls that are on the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> drop-down menu, set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ItemSize%2A> property to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.
trans-unit.target: 若要放大上的控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>下拉菜单中，将<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ItemSize%2A>属性`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时仅在某些情况下，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: To change the size of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> control, see the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ControlSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改的大小<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>控制，请参阅<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ControlSize%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> 控件的键盘快捷键。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the keyboard shortcut of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> 控件的键盘快捷键。

trans-unit.source: A KeyTip must have from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters.
trans-unit.target: 快捷键提示必须包含 1 到 3 个大写字符，并且必须包含空格、 制表符或换行字符。

trans-unit.source: KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls.
trans-unit.target: 键提示有时也称为访问密钥或快捷键，可用作激活控件的快捷组合键。

trans-unit.source: KeyTips appear on the Ribbon when you press the ALT key.
trans-unit.target: 当你按下 ALT 键时，键提示将显示在功能区上。

trans-unit.source: If your KeyTip conflicts with KeyTips for built-in controls or from other add-ins, Microsoft Office might assign non-conflicting KeyTip values automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果内置控件或从其他加载项，则与键提示中你快捷键提示相冲突，Microsoft Office 可能自动分配不冲突快捷键提示值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Use the keyboard to work with Ribbon programs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用键盘来使用功能区程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523)。

trans-unit.source: You can change the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.KeyTip%2A> at design time or run time.
trans-unit.target: 你可以更改<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.KeyTip%2A>在设计时或运行的时。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> 控件上的文本。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the text on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> 控件上的文本。

trans-unit.source: To hide the label, set <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ShowLabel%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要隐藏标签，设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ShowLabel%2A>到`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.Label%2A> property can be set at design time and run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.Label%2A>属性可设置在设计时和运行时间。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image to display on the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> control, if you want to use a built-in Microsoft Office icon.
trans-unit.target: 如果要使用内置 Microsoft Office 图标，请获取或设置要在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> 控件上显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: The ID of a built-in Microsoft Office icon that serves as the icon for this control.
trans-unit.target: 作为此控件图标的内置 Microsoft Office 图标的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.OfficeImageId%2A> property identifies an Office icon that is displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.OfficeImageId%2A>属性标识由控件显示 Office 图标。

trans-unit.source: The property value is a string that identifies the `imageMso` value of the selected icon.
trans-unit.target: 属性值是一个字符串，标识`imageMso`所选图标的值。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set at design time or at run time.
trans-unit.target: 在设计时或在运行时，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change.
trans-unit.target: 如果在运行时中更新此属性，将更新控件的外观，以反映更改。

trans-unit.source: For a list of `imageMso` values, see the Microsoft Download Center page [Office 2010 Add-In: Icons Gallery](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760).
trans-unit.target: 有关的列表`imageMso`值，请参阅 Microsoft 下载中心页面[Office 2010 外接程序： 图标库](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760)。

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored if the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.Image%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果忽略此属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.Image%2A>属性设置。

trans-unit.source: Images identified by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.OfficeImageId%2A> property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.Image%2A> property, because the images are cached in the Office application.
trans-unit.target: 标识的图像<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.OfficeImageId%2A>属性可以由标识的图像以外会稍微快一些加载<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.Image%2A>属性，因为这些图像缓存在 Office 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The following example assigns a Microsoft Office icon to a split button.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将 Microsoft Office 图标分配给拆分按钮。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：

trans-unit.source: Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to a project created by using Office development tools in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）**到通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的项目的项。

trans-unit.source: Add a group to the custom tab.
trans-unit.target: 将组添加到自定义选项卡。

trans-unit.source: Add a split button to the group.
trans-unit.target: 将拆分按钮添加到组。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> control, if the control is on the Microsoft Office Menu.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件位于 Microsoft Office 菜单上，请获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> 控件的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" /> that represents the position of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> control, if the control is on the Microsoft Office Menu.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" />，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> 控件的位置（如果控件位于 Microsoft Office 菜单上）。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this property to set the position of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> control within a group.
trans-unit.target: 你无法使用此属性将设置的位置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>组中的控件。

trans-unit.source: To arrange <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> controls, drag them to the correct positions or use the CTRL+arrow keys to move the controls in the Ribbon Designer.
trans-unit.target: 排列<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>控件拖动到正确的位置或使用 CTRL + 箭头键可在功能区设计器中移动控件。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时仅在某些情况下，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets tooltip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当用户将指针移到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> 控件上时显示的工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: The text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 当用户将指针移到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> 控件上时显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ScreenTip%2A> value must be less than 1024 characters in length.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ScreenTip%2A>值必须少于 1024年个字符的长度。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.SuperTip%2A> property is set, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ScreenTip%2A> value appears as the title of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.SuperTip%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.SuperTip%2A>设置属性，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ScreenTip%2A>值将显示的标题为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.SuperTip%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This property can be changed at design time and run time.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以在设计时更改和运行时。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the label for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> control is visible.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> 控件的标签是否可见。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the label for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> control is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> 控件的标签可见，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is always `true` if you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ControlSize%2A> property to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终是`true`如果你设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ControlSize%2A>属性`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。

trans-unit.source: This property can be changed at design time and run time.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以在设计时更改和运行时。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets multiline tooltip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当用户将指针移到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> 控件上时显示的多行工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains multiline tip text.
trans-unit.target: 包含多行提示文本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The string must be less than 1024 characters in length.
trans-unit.target: 字符串必须是长度小于 1024年个字符。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.SuperTip%2A> appears under <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ScreenTip%2A> text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.SuperTip%2A>下显示<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ScreenTip%2A>文本。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ScreenTip%2A>, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.SuperTip%2A> enables line breaks in the string.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ScreenTip%2A>、<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.SuperTip%2A>字符串中的启用分行符。

trans-unit.source: You can change the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.SuperTip%2A> at design time and at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 你可以更改<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.SuperTip%2A>在设计时和在运行时。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the title that appears on top of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> control if the control is on the Microsoft Office Menu.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> 控件位于 Microsoft Office 菜单上，请获取或设置该控件顶部显示的标题。

trans-unit.source: The title for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> control if the control is on the Microsoft Office Menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> 控件的标题（如果控件位于 Microsoft Office 菜单上）。

trans-unit.source: This property applies to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> only if it is on the Microsoft Office Menu.
trans-unit.target: 此属性适用于<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>只有为 Microsoft Office 菜单上。

trans-unit.source: This property can be changed at design time and at run time.
trans-unit.target: 在设计时和在运行时，可以更改此属性。
